page.title: 15OUR COMMUNITY INVOLVEMENT
page.content: We were all very upset by the pictures and reports which came from Ethiopia at the end of last year.We heard about the appeal for clothes and blankets which Oxfam were making.We decided to help. We were given a pattern for very simple jerseys from Oxfam and we and our relations set about knitting as many of these jerseys as we could.In the end we managed to finish 20. Then we started to knit 15cm. squares which we had to sew up to make blankets.Everybody worked very hard and we managed to produce 6 blankets. When we were finished we contacted Oxfam and on Wednesday 29th of May Mrs Hamilton from the Ayr Oxfam shop came to collect the blankets and jerseys.She said that she was very pleased that such a small community could produce so much.We felt good.
